Class Phantom

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tile
      • Monster
        • Phantom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Tile>

    public class Phantom
extends Monster
    This class is the representation of the Ghost-like Created in Game.It has a push Hero ability.
